Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NOMFAV, T1.VAL_OPERACAO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO, T1.SITUACAO FROM seguros.v0histsini T1, seguros.paraoper T2 WHERE T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T1.LIMCRR = :LIMCRR AND T1.VAL_OPERACAO = :VAL_OPERACAO AND (T1.OPERACAO BETWEEN 1181 AND 1184 OR T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO = 'JPIND') AND T1.OPERACAO = T2.COD_OPERACAO AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' ORDER BY T1.OCORHIST END SQL
